formatDescription: AskSam, originally created for DOS but later for Windows, was a database desktop application and personal information manager. It could organise emails, documents, text files, spreadsheets and web pages into dynamic folders and export reports or spreadsheets. Created by The Florida company askSam systems was formed in 1985. The final release was created for version 7 of Windows in 2008.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University

internalSignatures.name: askSam for Windows v.4-7
